item.title: Set your Raspberry Pi up for Wifi roaming
item.description: I've had a Raspberry Pi 2 just sitting around for several months, waiting for a purpose. Since I haven't come up with a purpose, I decided to make it a portable headless Linux box that will travel with me, connect to Wifi automatically, and eventually, hopefully, set it up as â€¦
item.dc:creator: mr.rcollins
